features: Comprehensive Loom Band Kit: Includes over 5500 loom bands in 40 vibrant colors, along with5500PCS one loom board ,3 small loom band Craft Hook ,1 big craft hook ,2 Y Hook ,2 Claw Clasp,20pcs pony beads , 18pcs heart beads ,5pcs tassels, 12pcs rubber pendant , 5 rope ,100pcs colorful connectors , 15pcs fruit beads 50pcs square black A,B,C beads , 50pcs colorful A,B,C beads ,3500pcs rubber bands

Unleash Endless Creativity – With 5500 vibrant loom bands, this all-in-one kit empowers kids to design unique bracelets, rings, necklaces, headbands, charms, and more. A perfect way to spark imagination and keep little hands happily creating for hours.

Upgraded Storage Box – Neat, Sturdy & Portable, comes with a newly designed storage box that keeps all accessories sorted, secure, and easily accessible. Perfect for staying organized at home or taking creativity on the go.
Versatile Craft Kit: Suitable for use with any loom, this kit includes various loom band sets and black loom bands to create unique and personalized designs.

Perfect Gift for Any Occasion – Whether it’s Christmas, birthdays, Easter, New Year, or just because, this vibrant loom band kit makes a thoughtful and fun DIY gift for both boys and girls. A sure way to bring joy and creativity to any celebration.
Boosts Early Development – Encourages fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, creativity, and color recognition in children through fun and engaging bracelet-making activities.
description: Product Description Daskid Loom Bands – Crafting Fun, Creating Bonds Turn screen time into quality time with Daskid Loom Bands! Our kits are the perfect way for families to create, connect, and enjoy a hands-on activity together. Crafting alongside friends, each kit brings endless opportunities to share laughs, explore creativity, and make memories that last. Start your next family craft adventure today! Daskid Loom Bands – Crafting Together, Bonding Forever At Daskid, we believe that crafting is more than just making things—it's about making memories. Our loom band kits bring friends and family together for moments filled with laughter, creativity, and connection. Perfect for all ages, these kits inspire teamwork and creativity, helping you build not just bracelets, but lasting bonds.
